intents.description: Analyze NPS by region to understand regional satisfaction differences
Compare overall satisfaction across different subscription plans to identify satisfaction disparities
Analyze correlation between feature usage and overall satisfaction to identify features driving satisfaction
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand loyalty patterns
Identify at-risk customers with low NPS and low purchase intent to assess retention risks

rationale: This analysis plan aims to provide actionable insights into customer satisfaction and retention for our SaaS analytics platform. By understanding NPS scores, satisfaction levels, and feature usage, we can identify key drivers of satisfaction and dissatisfaction, highlight underperforming segments, and assess retention risks. These insights are crucial for informing product improvements and strategic decisions to enhance customer experience and reduce churn.

suggested_segments.name: Promoters
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are highly likely to recommend (NPS 9-10)

suggested_segments.name: Detractors
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are unlikely to recommend (NPS 0-6)

suggested_segments.name: Free/Basic Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers on free or basic plans

suggested_segments.name: New Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with tenure less than 6 months

suggested_segments.name: At-risk Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with low NPS and low purchase intent indicating high churn risk
